thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Daniel Handler, Lisa Brown give a million to Planned Parenthood
thread.title_full: Daniel Handler, Lisa Brown give a million to Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Leah Garchik
title: Daniel Handler, Lisa Brown give a million to Planned Parenthood
text:
Cheryl Jennings: leaving anchor duties Cheryl Jennings: leaving anchor duties
“Lemony Snicket” writer Daniel Handler and artist/writer Lisa Brown , married and both San Francisco literary stars, have pledged a million dollars to Planned Parenthood. “We’ve been very fortunate, and good fortune should be shared with noble causes,” they said in coordinated tweets. Watching what they told Mother Jones was the “deceitful pummelling” of the group in congressional debate “was frankly more than we could take.” Cheryl Jennings: leaving anchor duties Cheryl Jennings: leaving anchor duties

Watching what they told Mother Jones was the “deceitful pummelling” of the group in congressional debate “was frankly more than we could take.”
